title: Zuma hit with arms deal corruption charges
text:
Zuma hit with arms deal corruption charges 5:03am IST - 01:15 
Former South African President Jacob Zuma will be prosecuted for corruption relating to a 30 billion rand ($2.5 billion) state arms deal in the late 1990s, the chief state prosecutor said on Friday (March 16).   
Former South African President Jacob Zuma will be prosecuted for corruption relating to a 30 billion rand ($2.5 billion) state arms deal in the late 1990s, the chief state prosecutor said on Friday (March 16).  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/03/16/zuma-hit-with-arms-deal-corruption-charg?videoId=409532472&videoChannel=13423
